SELECT DISTINCT stu_cls,tea_name,course_name,stu_course.course_id,tea_id FROM stu_cls NATURAL JOIN tea_info JOIN stu_info ON stu_cls.cls = stu_info.stu_cls JOIN stu_score ON stu_score.stu_id = stu_info.stu_id JOIN stu_course ON stu_score.course_id = stu_course.course_id
and cls_name like concat('%', #{stuCls}, '%') and tea_name like concat('%', #{teacherName}, '%') and course_name like concat('%', #{courseName}, '%')
SELECT stu_no,ROUND(AVG(finally_score)) `avgScore` FROM stu_score ss JOIN stu_info si ON ss.stu_id=si.stu_id WHERE stu_cls = #{stuCls} GROUP BY ss.stu_id
